Articles.Content:
Hello guys ! Here is my first SSTO - so damn cool: fast, easy to control, heavy - hard to lose control when forgot about swapping engines, nice design !

So what i want to say...first of all thanks to zekes - i used prototype of his engines, also i want to say some words to Levelord: "Thank you for your pretty damn awesome plane SSTO VTOL Amphibius 2 - this is my favorite plane, hope you dont stop on it and continue to modificate it". Should say that here, on forum, not so much SSTO VTOL planes, if some one have it - please share it to me, cause its kinda my favorite vehicle in KSP !

So, some screenshots with statistic and portfolio of this beautiful spaceplane:

Well, if there is some good engineers who want to upgrade this plane and make it better (VTOL for example) or make stability stronger - i share it. Guys, fly save !)

http://www./?xz2tt9mn5htmosn
